news_header: Job vacancies decreased significantly in Finland from 2023 to 2024, especially in Uusimaa and Greater Helsinki.
news_original_title: Avoimia työpaikkoja oli viime vuonna selvästi vähemmän
news_text: The number of job vacancies in Finland fell from 54,500 in 2023 to 43,700 in 2024, with significant decreases in Uusimaa and Greater Helsinki. Temporary jobs made up a third of vacancies, and the decline continued into the fourth quarter.
